channel.title: Battleaxe V2 added
channel.description:
Hey, decided to post this battleaxe i recently made. It's not good but (hopefully) not too horrible.
Note: I Did extrude and use prims, the blade messup was with knifetool wanted to Maternal it.
Please constructive critisism only, Thanks.
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/ev410w.png[/img]
Version 2 :
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2wgvspc.png[/img]

well, i guess it’s nice,
it’s a little to basic.i’m sure that you can do better, you just have to come up with a more fantasy type design, well at least that’s what i think is popular on these forums

I am trying my best i just cant render very well and if you posted like you did on my other model it owuld of been fine.

item.title: Battleaxe V2 added
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“claunchii, post:8, topic:362216”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=458503.msg3355086#msg3355086 date=1285731139]

Simple. Boring. Why is it square?

CONSTRUCTIVE CRITISM. Anything else is spam, and unwanted.

UUhhh kid you have no idea what you’re talking about.
Do you want sentences? Will that make it better??

It’s simple, not much thought applied. It’s boring, not much to look at. Ur handle is square. Handle/ pole things aren’t square, they’re round. So maybe just use your brain next time before making a useless post on how you failed to precede something.

Edit: Added boldness it would be easier for your small brain.
[/quote]

Want me to give you the model? The handel isn’t square i beveled it 2.0. And i wasn’t trying a master piece i was trying my best to make a model, put it on here so i could have some HELP. Now please, stop acting like a jackass or dont reply. And what i consider constuctive critism is tell me what i did wrong, then how to fix it. Percieve*^^

:ONTOPIC: The wanderer if i see it when he makes it ill be happy to watch! :)[/quote]
Ok, so you’re not making your best effort and you want help? Why not make the truely best of your abilities so that way we can properly critique you on your abilities. Also, construction criticism is anything said that you could use to improve your work. Also, when you bevel and edge, rework the model, because the wireframe is still a square.

Read full topic

item.title: Battleaxe V2 added
item.dc:creator: @claunchii claunchii
item.description:
@claunchii wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:2, topic:362216”]Maternal?
1 : of, relating to, belonging to, or characteristic of a mother : motherly
2
a : related through a mother
b : inherited or derived from the female parent
Wireframe is a bit messy. But it is deffinately getting better. Easier way to make that gray part. Just segment it once more and scale it out. Don’t have to make all of those unnecessary points. Or just cut once through in a straight line. Don’t cut each individual face.[/quote]

Haha! Material or maternial idk what it is is what i was talking about lol. And thanks i’m probly gonig to remake it.

Read full topic

item.title: Battleaxe V2 added
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Maternal?
1 : of, relating to, belonging to, or characteristic of a mother : motherly
2
a : related through a mother
b : inherited or derived from the female parent
Wireframe is a bit messy. But it is deffinately getting better. Easier way to make that gray part. Just segment it once more and scale it out. Don’t have to make all of those unnecessary points. Or just cut once through in a straight line. Don’t cut each individual face.

Read full topic
